effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
将对手困在
激烈的火焰旋涡中，
在４～５回合内进行攻击。

激しく　渦をまく　炎の中に
４ー５ターンの　間
相手を　閉じこめて　攻撃する。

The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex
of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Intrappola il bersaglio in un turbine di fuoco
che dura per quattro o cinque turni.

Un aro de fuego que atrapa al objetivo de cuatro a 
cinco turnos.

Das Ziel wird für vier bis fünf Runden in einem
Feuerkreis gefangen.

Un tourbillon de flammes emprisonne l’ennemi
pendant quatre à cinq tours.

將對手困在
熊熊燃燒的火焰旋渦中，
在４～５回合內進行攻擊。

세차게 소용돌이치는 불꽃 속에
4-5턴 동안
상대를 가두어 공격한다.

はげしく　うずをまく　ほのおの　なかに
４ー５ターンの　あいだ
あいてを　とじこめて　こうげきする。

激しく　渦をまく　炎の中に
４ー５ターンの　あいだ
相手を　閉じこめて　攻撃する。
